subject: Re: smbtorture DENY2
body:
On Tue, Apr 24, 2007 at 03:39:34PM -0700, Herb Lewis wrote:
> I tried running smbtorture DENY2 test against the latest 3.0.25
> svn code and it is super slow. The test used to run in about 8 secs.
> Now it is taking 527 secs. Is anyone else seeing this?

It shouldn't run in 8 secs. - the 1 sec deny delay
means the second number is more plausible. It must
have been a while since you ran this :-).
